thread.title: BRIEF-Altona Mining Says Federal Court Of Australia Made Orders Approving Scheme Of Arrangement

title: BRIEF-Altona Mining Says Federal Court Of Australia Made Orders Approving Scheme Of Arrangement

organizations.name: brief-altona mining says federal court of australia

text:
April 3, 2018 / 8:51 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Altona Mining Says Federal Court Of Australia Made Orders Approving Scheme Of Arrangement Reuters Staff 
April 3 (Reuters) - Altona Mining Ltd: 
* FEDERAL COURT OF AUSTRALIA MADE ORDERS APPROVING SCHEME OF ARRANGEMENT BETWEEN CO & ITS SHAREHOLDERS 
* AS PER SCHEME OF ARRANGEMENT, COPPER MOUNTAIN MINING CORP TO BUY ALL SHARES IN ALTONA 
* EXPECTED THAT TRADING IN ALTONA’S SHARES ON ASX WILL BE SUSPENDED FROM CLOSE OF TRADING ON APRIL 4 ​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
